snippet: Outkast, an uncommon hip-hop band that has covered a lot of ground since its first record in 1994, started a 40-date tour of large-scale shows by headlining at the Coachella Music and Arts Festival on Friday.
abstract: Outkast, an uncommon hip-hop band that has covered a lot of ground since its first record in 1994, started a 40-date tour of large-scale shows by headlining at the Coachella Music and Arts Festival on Friday.

keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
